profile.helpDescription: Find answers to common questions or get in touch with our support team
profile.contactDescription: Can't find what you're looking for? Send us a message and we'll get back to you.
profile.faq1Question: How do I report a civic issue?
profile.faq1Answer: Tap the "+" button on the home screen, fill in the details about the issue, add photos if available, and submit. Your report will be sent to the relevant authorities.
profile.faq2Question: How can I track my complaint status?
profile.faq2Answer: Go to the "My Complaints" tab in the Complaints section. You can view all your submitted complaints and their current status.
profile.faq3Question: What types of issues can I report?
profile.faq3Answer: You can report various civic issues including potholes, street light problems, garbage collection, water supply issues, and other public infrastructure problems.
profile.faq4Question: How do I update my profile information?
profile.faq4Answer: Go to Profile > Settings > Personal Information to update your details, or tap on your profile picture to change it.
profile.faq5Answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal information and complaint data.
profile.liveChatComingSoon: Live chat will be available soon!
profile.subject: Subject
profile.subjectPlaceholder: What can we help you with?
profile.messageSentDescription: Thank you for contacting us. We will respond to your message within 24 hours.
profile.missionText: Civic Reporter is a crowdsourced platform that connects citizens with local governments to address civic issues efficiently. We believe in transparent governance and community participation to create better living environments for everyone.
profile.meetTeam: Meet the dedicated team behind Civic Reporter
profile.categoryRoadsDesc: Report potholes, damaged pavements, unsafe road conditions, or encroachments.
profile.categoryLightingDesc: Non-functional streetlights, exposed wires, or electrical pole issues.
profile.categorySanitationDesc: Overflowing garbage bins, irregular pickup, open drains, or illegal dumping.
profile.categoryWaterDesc: Water leakage, blocked sewers, no water supply, or contaminated water.
profile.categoryHealthDesc: Mosquito breeding, stagnant water, animal carcasses, or unhygienic surroundings.
profile.categoryParksDesc: Unmaintained parks, broken benches, damaged trees, or need for plantation.
profile.categoryTrafficDesc: Broken signals, missing signage, illegal parking, or road encroachments.
profile.categorySafetyDesc: Fire hazards, building collapse, unsafe structures, or accidents.
profile.categoryEducationDesc: Damaged school toilets, poor upkeep of libraries, or community halls.
profile.categoryEncroachmentsDesc: Unauthorized shops, hawkers blocking pathways, or illegal structures.
profile.categoryEnvironmentDesc: Air/noise pollution, waste burning, or polluted lakes and ponds.
profile.categoryAnimalDesc: Stray dogs, cattle menace, or injured/abandoned animals.
profile.categoryServicesDesc: Delays in birth/death certificates, property tax disputes, billing issues.
profile.categoryOthersDesc: Any issues excluding the given categories
